extension_description.message: Fetolela mongolo o khethiloeng leqepheng la tepo ebe u o fetolela ho sebopeho se boletsoeng.

turn_off_description.message: Konopo ea ho fetolela e tla hlaha nako le nako ha ho khethoa mongolo

turn_on_description.message: Konopo ea ho fetolela e ke ke ea hlaha ha mongolo o khethoa, empa u ntse u ka fetolela ka ho tobetsa letšoao la Pro Translate ho toolbar.

ui_language_description.message: Khetha puo ea UI ea kamehla

target_language_description.message: Khetha puo eo u batlang ho e sebelisa

auto_switch.message: Fetolela puong ea bobeli eo ho buuoang ka eona

auto_switch_description.message: Ha mongolo o khethiloeng e le puo eo ho buuoang ka eona kamehla, e fetolele puong ea bobeli eo ho fetoleloang ho eona

second_target_language_description.message: Khetha puo ea bobeli eo u batlang ho e sebelisa

target_format_description.message: Khetha sebopeho sa sepheo sa kamehla, sebopeho se ka fetoloa phanele ea phetolelo

auto_set_format_description.message: Ha u fetola sebopeho phanele ea phetolelo, seta fomete e khethiloeng hore e be sebopeho sa kamehla

format_and_order_description.message: Maemo a fomete a ka fetoloang phanele ea phetolelo le tatellano ea ponts'o

translate_button_on_description.message: Konopo ea ho fetolela e tla hlaha nako le nako ha ho khethoa mongolo

translate_button_off_description.message: Konopo ea ho fetolela e ke ke ea hlaha ha mongolo o khethoa, empa u ntse u ka fetolela ka ho tobetsa letšoao la Pro Translate ho toolbar.
